message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, considering it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. It's a bit lower than what you're asking, but I'm willing to make a deal.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $8,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.
